descriptions.deepfake: Financial suspicious activity detection ke liye comprehensive video analysis. YouTube videos aur doosre media analyze karta hai - deepfakes, impersonation, jhoothe daave, manipulated content, aur unauthorized financial advice ke liye. Hamare AI investors ki safety ke liye video, audio, metadata aur content claims check karta hai.
descriptions.social: WhatsApp, Telegram aur social media par pump-and-dump schemes, fake investment tips, Ponzi schemes aur coordinated market manipulation attempts monitor karta hai.
descriptions.announcement: Historical data se cross-reference karke, compliance requirements check karke aur suspicious patterns detect karke corporate announcements ki authenticity verify karta hai.
descriptions.sebiQuery: Comprehensive SEBI registry intelligence access kariye. Instantly broker registrations verify kariye, Alternative Investment Funds search kariye, multi-segment operators identify kariye, aur AI-powered natural language search ke saath 4,923+ registered intermediaries analyze kariye.
descriptions.documentAnalyzer: Advanced document fraud detection system jo suspicious investment documents, certificates, aur letters analyze karta hai. AI-powered OCR use karke PDFs aur images se text extract karta hai, phir fraud indicators, fake SEBI approvals, suspicious patterns detect karta hai aur comprehensive risk scores calculate karta hai taaki investors ko document-based scams se protection mil sake.

inputLabels.general: Analysis ke liye suspicious content enter kariye

placeholders.deepfake: YouTube URL, transcript, ya suspicious video/audio ka description paste kariye...
placeholders.social: WhatsApp/Telegram message ya social media post paste kariye...
placeholders.announcement: Corporate announcement ya news paste kariye...

SEBI ke official registry database mein search kariye...

results.suspiciousReportingText: Is content ko potential suspicious activity ke roop mein flag kiya gaya hai. Doosre investors ki safety ke liye turant report kariye.
results.fileComplaint: 🚨 SEBI SCORES Portal par Complaint file kariye
results.saveEvidence: 💡 Report karne se pehle saare evidence (screenshots, URLs, transcripts) save kariye

disclaimer.title: ⚠️ AI Analysis Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Yeh analysis AI-generated hai aur sirf jaankari ke liye diya gaya hai. getclarity.finance is output ke aadhar par liye gaye investment decisions ki koi zimmedari nahi leti. Hamesha apni research kariye aur qualified financial advisors se salah liye investment decisions lene se pehle. AI mein limitations aur errors ho sakte hain.
disclaimer.emphasis: Financial Advice Nahi • Apne Risk Par Use Kariye • Independently Verify Kariye
